description: Job posting fixtures in Greenhouse format
html:
Senior Data Scientist - ML PlatformSan Francisco, CA
Staff Software Engineer - BackendSan Francisco, CA (Remote OK)
Product Manager - Analytics PlatformNew York, NY
Senior DevOps EngineerAustin, TX
Machine Learning Engineer - Computer VisionSan Francisco, CA

job_postings.title: Senior Data Scientist - ML Platform
job_postings.description: We're looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join our ML Platform team. You'll work on building and deploying machine learning models at scale, collaborating with product and engineering teams to deliver impactful data-driven solutions.

job_postings.title: Staff Software Engineer - Backend
job_postings.description: Join our backend engineering team to build scalable distributed systems that power our analytics platform. You'll design and implement high-performance APIs and data pipelines.

job_postings.title: Product Manager - Analytics Platform
job_postings.description: Lead product strategy for our core analytics platform. Work with customers, engineering, and design to define and deliver features that help businesses make better data-driven decisions.

job_postings.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
job_postings.description: Build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Focus on reliability, scalability, and security of our production systems.

job_postings.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Computer Vision
job_postings.description: Develop and deploy computer vision models for document processing and data extraction. Work with cutting-edge deep learning techniques and production ML systems.
